ENGLISH: United Nations General Assembly Resolution 36/55, The Declaration on the Elimination of All Forms of Intolerance and of Discrimination Based on Religion or Belief.
United Nations General Assembly Resolution 36/55, The Declaration on the Elimination of All Forms of Intolerance and of Discrimination Based on Religion or Belief, has been opened for voting.
Shall we receive notifications when nations decide their vote on the current UN Resolution undergoing a vote?\nThese can be turned off at any time by an international decision.

United Nations General Assembly Resolution 36/55, The Declaration on the Elimination of All Forms of Intolerance and of Discrimination Based on Religion or Belief, has been defeated by vote in the United Nations General Assembly.

United Nations General Assembly Resolution 36/55, The Declaration on the Elimination of All Forms of Intolerance and of Discrimination Based on Religion or Belief, has passed its vote in the United Nations General Assembly.
UN Vote on Religious Intolerance Declaration

We have the opportunity to vote on United Nations General Assembly Resolution 36/55, The Declaration on the Elimination of All Forms of Intolerance and of Discrimination Based on Religion or Belief.\nWe can either vote For it, Abstain, or vote Against it.
